english.segment1: Let worship be the fuel for mission's flame. We're going with a passion for Your name. We're going for we care about Your praise. Send us out
english.segment2: Let worship be the heart of mission's aim. To see the nations recognise Your fame. 'Til every tribe and tongue voices Your praise. Send us out
english.segment3: You should be the praise of every tongue. You should be the joy of every heart. But until the fullness of Your kingdom comes. Until that final revelation dawns. Send us out
english.segment4: Every tribe, every tongue. Every creature in the heavens and the earth. Every heart, every soul. Will sing Your praise, will sing Your praise. Every note, every strain. Every melody will be for You alone. Every harmony that flows from every tongue. Will sing Your praise, will sing Your praise. Will sing Your praise, will sing Your praise
